		            Treatment Options by Stage
		            
		                
		                    Stage I and Stage II Oropharyngeal Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage I and stage II oropharyngeal cancer may include the following:         -  Radiation therapy.    -  Surgery.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage
